case.title: Looking for a "live in" best friend & lover - 52 (Danbury)
case.text: are you seeking the companionship of a partner? tired of going to bed each night alone? me too! looking to meet a handsome white male aged 36-46 someone that is able to relocate. 5'4" 118lbs. brown hair blue eyes fit let's enjoy each others company! send stats. please include "lover" in the subject line.
